alert.note: Alert for Clarion; Forest; Jefferson; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 11:33AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A BAND OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN VENANGO...CENTRAL JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN CLARION AND SOUTHWESTERN FOREST COUNTIES... At 1130 AM EST, a band of lake effect snow showers were located over Reynoldsville, or near DuBois, and will be fairly stationary. These showers with heavier snow will create periods of reduced visibility and quicker accumulations on roadways. Locations impacted include... Brookville, Reynoldsville, Brockway, Tionesta, Hasson Heights, Sykesville, Falls Creek, Strattanville, Rouseville, Corsica, Sigel, and Pleasantville. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 70 and 96. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this intense snow shower. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the squall passes your location.
